posts.title: Looking for freedom
posts.body: What a wonderfull way of living you can find in in the south of wales.

posts.title: Luckily alive!
posts.body: I had a terrible accident last month. My car is completly done. I am glad to be alive.
posts.author: Lukas Laureg
